price: Kuma mãtarsa tanã tsaye.* Ta yi dãriya. Sai Muka yi mata bushãra (da haihuwar) Is'hãƙa, kuma a bayan Is'hãƙa, Yãƙũbu.
arabic: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ
footnotes: * Matar Ibrãhĩm Sãrah tanã tsaye ga yi musu hidima, sai ta yi dãriyar mamãki, dõmin bãƙin sun ƙi cin abinci. Waɗansu na fassarãwa ta yi haila. Wannan bai dãce ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-im'ra-atuhu qāimatun faḍaḥikat fabasharnāhā bi-is'ḥāqa wamin warāi is'ḥāqa yaʿqūba
translations: Then We gave her glad tidings
